Title: Relates to directing the state comptroller to act as a fiscal monitor for the distribution and expenditure of federal funds received by any town through the CARES Act
Summary: Directs the state comptroller to act as a fiscal monitor for the distribution and expenditure of federal funds received by any town through the Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security (CARES) Act of 2020.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the state comptroller to act as a fiscal monitor for the distribution and expenditure of federal funds received by any town through the CARES Act
